query: WITH entities AS (SELECT credit_facility_id, approval_process_id, id FROM disbursals WHERE ((credit_facility_id = ANY($1)) AND (COALESCE((approval_process_id, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY approval_process_id ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: DisbursalId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN disbursal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_id asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
